disableCheckbox.description: Disables the checkbox of the treeNode

icon.description: customize icon. When you pass component, whose render will receive full TreeNode props as component props

isLeaf.description: Determines if this is a leaf node(effective when loadData is specified)

key.description: Used with (default)ExpandedKeys / (default)CheckedKeys / (default)SelectedKeys. P.S.: It must be unique in all of treeNodes of the tree!

selectable.description: Set whether the treeNode can be selected

slots.description: When using treeNodes, you can use this property to configure the properties that support the slot, such as slots: { title: 'XXX'}

scopedSlots.description: When using treeNodes, you can use this property to configure the properties that support the slot-scope, such as scopedSlots: { title: 'XXX'}

on.description: When using treeNodes, you can use this property to configure the events, such as on: { click: () => {}}
